item.title: Superman vs Fantastic Four: Impressive Trailer Stat Suggests Which Superhero Movie Will Win July's Battle
item.description: Fantastic Four: First Steps and Superman dropped trailers for their upcoming July releases, and the competition is already heating up between the two.

item.title: The Divergent Franchise's Most Divisive Death Gets Humorous Reflection From Author 11 Years Later
item.description: Bestselling author Veronica Roth, the creator of the Divergent franchise, reflects on the book series' most divisive character death in a funny way.

item.title: Why Lilacs Appear So Much In Nosferatu & What It Really Means
item.description: Lilacs are a key symbol in Robert Eggers' Nosferatu, appearing throughout the movie in association with Ellen Hutter (Lily-Rose Depp).
